patthana8.2:5.1: Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana8.2:5.2: vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana8.2:5.4: dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ.
patthana8.2:5.5: Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana8.2:5.6: vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana8.2:5.8: Nasahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.2:6.1: Naahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.2:7.1: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:7.2: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:7.3: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.2:8.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana8.2:11.1: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.2:11.2: Nasahetuko dhammo naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.2:11.3: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa ca naahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana8.2:12.1: Naahetuko dhammo naahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana8.2:13.1: Nasahetuko dhammo nasahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.2:14.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare nava … pe … sahajāte nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme … pe … jhāne cattāri, magge tīṇi, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca … pe … avigate nava.
